steps.defaultDescription: Select one of the KFC values to recognize your colleague for.

values.title: Grit
values.description: Showing real perseverance, determination and resilence.

values.title: Hardwork
values.description: Working tirelessly with the team to deliver amazing standards and service for our guests.

values.title: Southern Hospitality
values.description: Always delivering five star service and going the extra mile for guests.

values.title: Integrity
values.description: Going the extra mile and being proud to deliver excellence.

values.title: Generosity
values.description: Showing generosity in your work and gives great coaching and has a 'take the team with you' mindset.

messages: Thanks for all your hard work üëä
